error.signature: TypeError: callback is not a function
error.regex: TypeError:.*callback.*is not a function|TypeError:.*is not a function

verdict.summary: Callback argument is undefined. Common when using promisified API with callback style, or missing argument.

dead_ends.why_fails: Hides the real issue — the function signature changed
The error is thrown synchronously before the callback — catch won't help async flow

workarounds.action: Check if you're mixing callback and promise APIs — use await or .then() instead
workarounds.how:
// Old: fs.readFile(path, callback)
// New: const data = await fs.promises.readFile(path)

workarounds.action: Verify all required arguments are passed — the callback might be a missing middle argument
